keyMoments.title: Nami's Rain Tempo
keyMoments.description: Nami demonstrates her Clima-Tact's Rain Tempo ability during her battle with Miss Doublefinger.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami learning to master the Clima-Tact's weather abilities.

keyMoments.title: Nami's Mirage Tempo
keyMoments.description: Nami uses her Clima-Tact to manipulate humidity and create illusions of herself.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's growing tactical intelligence in combat.

keyMoments.title: Nami's Thunderbolt Tempo
keyMoments.description: Nami creates a small thundercloud and electrifies it to shock Miss Doublefinger with a powerful electric attack.
keyMoments.significance: First use of Nami's offensive electric attack, showing her mastery of the Clima-Tact's combat functions.

keyMoments.title: Nami's Tornado Tempo Defeats Miss Doublefinger
keyMoments.description: Nami activates the Clima-Tact's ultimate attack, Tornado Tempo, launching Miss Doublefinger through multiple buildings.
keyMoments.significance: Nami's first major solo victory, proving her worth as a combatant and establishing Tornado Tempo as a signature move.

keyMoments.title: Nami Defeats Miss Doublefinger
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger is left unconscious and defeated. Nami collapses from exhaustion but has won her first major battle.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Nami's evolution from non-combatant to capable fighter.

abilities.description: Nami uses her Clima-Tact to create rain using Cool Balls.
Nami manipulates humidity to create illusions of herself.
Nami creates a thundercloud using Heat and Cool Balls, then electrifies it with a Thunder Ball.
The ultimate Clima-Tact attack that creates a violent tornado capable of launching opponents through buildings.

reveals.information: Mastered multiple Clima-Tact weather manipulation techniques
Achieved her first major solo victory against a powerful opponent

name.japanese: ザラ (ミス・ダブルフィンガー)

keyMoments.title: Sea Urchin Stinger
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger creates spikes all over her body in a sea urchin formation using her Toge Toge no Mi powers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full combat capabilities of the Toge Toge no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Toge Toge Doping
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger enhances her physical abilities by growing spikes inside her body to stimulate her muscles.
keyMoments.significance: Shows creative application of the Toge Toge no Mi for self-enhancement.

keyMoments.title: Stinger Flail
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger transforms her arms into spiked flails and swings them wildly at Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the offensive versatility of the Toge Toge no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Nami
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger is defeated by Nami's Tornado Tempo and left unconscious.
keyMoments.significance: Eliminates one of Baroque Works' top agents and shows Nami's growth.

abilities.description: Creates spikes all over the body in a sea urchin formation for offense and defense.
Grows spikes inside the body to stimulate muscles, enhancing physical abilities.
Transforms arms into spiked flails for devastating area attacks.

keyMoments.title: Pluton's Existence Revealed
keyMoments.description: Crocodile reveals the existence of Pluton, an ancient weapon capable of destroying entire islands.
keyMoments.significance: First major reveal of one of the three Ancient Weapons.
keyMoments.quote: Pluton... an ancient weapon strong enough to destroy an entire island without a trace.

keyMoments.title: Bomb Plot Revealed
keyMoments.description: Crocodile reveals his bomb planted in Palace Square set to detonate at 4:30 PM.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the conflict and shows Crocodile's ruthlessness.
keyMoments.quote: At 4:30, one and a half hours from now, a bomb will explode in Palace Square.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Seeks the Poneglyph
keyMoments.description: Crocodile forces King Cobra to lead him to the Poneglyph that contains information about Pluton's location.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Crocodile's ultimate plan and establishes the importance of Poneglyphs.

reveals.information: Crocodile's true goal is to obtain the ancient weapon Pluton to gain ultimate power
Crocodile knows about the Poneglyphs and their connection to the Ancient Weapons

name.japanese: ネフェルタリ・コブラ

keyMoments.title: Learns of Crocodile's Knowledge of Pluton
keyMoments.description: Cobra is shocked that Crocodile knows about Pluton, the ancient weapon secret passed down in the royal family.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the Nefertari family's role as guardians of dangerous ancient knowledge.

keyMoments.title: Forced to Lead Crocodile to the Poneglyph
keyMoments.description: Cobra agrees to take Crocodile to the location of the Poneglyph under duress.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Cobra's difficult position between protecting ancient secrets and his kingdom.

reveals.information: The Nefertari royal family guards the secret of Pluton's existence
Cobra knows the location of a Poneglyph in Arabasta

keyMoments.title: Learns About Pluton
keyMoments.description: Vivi witnesses Crocodile revealing the existence of the ancient weapon Pluton to her father.
keyMoments.significance: Vivi learns the true depth of Crocodile's ambitions and the ancient secrets her family guards.

keyMoments.title: Learns of the Bomb Plot
keyMoments.description: Vivi learns that a bomb will explode in Palace Square at 4:30 PM, threatening both armies.
keyMoments.significance: Adds urgency to Vivi's mission to stop the war and save her people.

name.japanese: ニコ・ロビン (ミス・オールサンデー)

keyMoments.title: Accompanies to the Poneglyph
keyMoments.description: Robin accompanies Crocodile and Cobra to the Poneglyph, as she is the only one who can read it.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Robin's unique role as the only person alive who can read Poneglyphs.

reveals.information: Robin is needed to read the Poneglyph to find Pluton's location

keyMoments.title: Zoro vs Mr. 1 Begins
keyMoments.description: Zoro encounters Mr. 1 and begins their battle, recognizing that his opponent's body is made of steel.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up one of the most important fights in the Arabasta arc that will lead to Zoro learning to cut steel.

keyMoments.title: Ushi Bari Against Mr. 1
keyMoments.description: Zoro uses his Ushi Bari technique against Mr. 1, but it proves ineffective against his steel body.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the challenge Zoro faces and foreshadows his need to evolve.

abilities.description: A three-sword style technique where Zoro attacks with powerful thrusts.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 1 vs Zoro Begins
keyMoments.description: Mr. 1 begins his battle with Zoro, demonstrating his steel body from the Supa Supa no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Mr. 1 as a formidable opponent for Zoro.

keyMoments.title: Spider Technique
keyMoments.description: Mr. 1 transforms his fingers into blades and attacks Zoro with his Spider technique.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the offensive capabilities of the Supa Supa no Mi.

abilities.description: Mr. 1 transforms his fingers into blades for a slashing attack.
